title: What Does the 🥺 (Pleading Face) Emoji Mean?

steps.title: The 🥺 (pleading face) emoji is used to earn extra sympathy points.
steps.content: The 🥺 (pleading face) emoji is used to earn extra sympathy points. The 🥺 (pleading face) emoji can be used as a substitute for the classic sad emojis to tug on a person’s heartstrings. “Please don’t be mad! 🥺💗” “I had the worst day today 🥺😭”

steps.title: The 🥺 (pleading face) emoji can be used to ask for something.
steps.content: The 🥺 (pleading face) emoji can be used to ask for something. It’s sometimes paired with the 👉 (backhand index pointing right) and the 👈 (backhand index pointing left) emojis. [2] X Research source “Would you wanna visit this weekend? 🥺👉👈” The image of a person pointing their fingers together is a symbol of being bashful while requesting something. This gesture actually has its own emoji on TikTok! [3] X Research source

steps.title: The 🥺 (pleading face) emoji can be used to express sadness.
steps.content: The 🥺 (pleading face) emoji can be used to express sadness. The emotional look on the 🥺 (pleading face) emoji’s face makes it a popular choice for sad-themed content, like a TikTok discussing romantic struggles. “Nooo I’m so sorry to hear that 🥺” “I can’t believe it!! That’s so sad to hear 🥺🥺”

steps.title: Use the 🥺 (pleading face) emoji to earn some extra pity points.
steps.content: Use the 🥺 (pleading face) emoji to earn some extra pity points. When sad faces just don’t seem to cut it, toss some 🥺 (pleading face) emojis into the mix. “My package got lost in the mail UGH 🥺🥺” “They gave me the 8 AM shift on Monday… 🥺🥺🥺”

steps.title: Send the 🥺 (pleading face) emoji when you’re asking a favor.
steps.content: Send the 🥺 (pleading face) emoji when you’re asking a favor. Trying to ask your friend or partner for a favor? See if the 🥺 (pleading face) emoji can sway them. “Could you pick up some coffee for me on your way home? 🥺” “Babe, could you bring my phone charger over to my room? 🥺👉👈”

steps.title: Show how sad you’re feeling with the 🥺 (pleading face) emoji.
steps.content: Show how sad you’re feeling with the 🥺 (pleading face) emoji. While this emoji might not be the best choice for seriously upsetting topics, it’s still a great way to express mild sadness. “I can’t believe I have to wait 365 more days until Christmas 🥺” “I wish you were here with me 🥺💔”

steps.title: Reply to the 🥺 (pleading face) emoji in whatever way feels best to you.
steps.content: Reply to the 🥺 (pleading face) emoji in whatever way feels best to you. People use the 🥺 (pleading face) emoji in a lot of different ways, and there isn’t a right or wrong way respond. Here are a few examples for inspiration, depending on the context of the conversation: “I think I’m getting sick 🥺🥺” Response: “Oh no!! Want me to bring over some soup?” “Could you grab me some Red Bull when you go to the store? 🥺👉👈” Response: “I’m pretty sure your blood is already 99% caffeine at this point but ok” “I really wish we were back in LA 😭🥺” Response: “I know, right?! It was such a great trip 💖”

steps.title: 🥹 (face holding back tears) emoji
steps.content: 🥹 (face holding back tears) emoji The 🥹 (face holding back tears) emoji features a slightly smiling face with puppy-dog eyes that are filled with tears. Like the 🥺 (pleading face) emoji, it can be used to express gratefulness and adoration or negative emotions, like sadness.

steps.title: 😳 (flushed) emoji
steps.content: 😳 (flushed) emoji The 😳 (flushed) emoji features a face with wide eyes, a small mouth, and blushing cheeks. It can be used to express embarrassment, as well as more positive emotions, like surprise, love, and excitement.
